attributes.action: UK to Pull out and Stop Funding the Eurovision Song Contest
attributes.additional_details: we as a nation would like to see our funding stopped for the Eurovision Song Contest.  It has now become far too political.  Year after year we plough millions into making it become the spectacular that it is only to become humiliated from all the Eastern block voting.  Enough is now enough.  The money could be better spent on projects that would benefit us as a nation.
